description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Radiant

Standard

Reach 3

+30 vs AC; 2d8+10 damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 radiant damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+30 vs AC; 3d8+7 damage.

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Standard

The dragon teleports 5 squares, makes a claw attack, teleports 5 squares, and makes a claw attack against a different target.

Recharge 5-6

Minor, Recharge

Reach 3

+28 vs Fortitude; 3d10+7 damage, and the dragon pushes the target 3 squares.

At-Will

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

The target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses against the dragon's attacks until the dragon uses this power on another target.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Radiant

Standard

Close blast 5

+28 vs Reflex; 4d8+4 radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Radiant, Teleportation

Standard

Close burst 10, targets up to four enemies

+28 vs Reflex; 3d8+7 damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 radiant damage and is dazed (save ends both). Effect: The dragon teleports to a space in the burst.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +28 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When the dragon is hit by an attack

The dragon gains a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the dragon teleports 6 squares.

HP 916; Bloodied 458 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 25 radiant 		Init +24 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 39Fort 36Ref 38Will 36
Speed 10, fly 12 (hover), overland flight 16, teleport 10
Ability ScoresStr 25 (+19)

Int 23 (+18)		Wis 25 (+19)
Cha 23 (+18)
Languages Common, Draconic, Supernal
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Diplomacy +23, History +23, Insight +24, Intimidate +23, Religion +23Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 29 | Insight 34
